title: Software Developer @ Waterloop
description: Developed a contact form using React, facilitating prospective donors in submitting their details and establishing communication with our team.
Conducted testing and executed a responsive web design to guarantee optimal scaling of the website across various screen sizes.

title: President of Business Council @ A.Y. Jackson Secondary School
description: Led a 12-person executive team dedicated to enhancing youth financial literacy for over 100 club members.
Organized annual curriculum plan, integrating financial lessons with interactive events.
Hosted the AYJ Stock Market Competition, overseeing a community of over 200 active traders.

title: Senior Lecturer of Coding Club @ A.Y. Jackson Secondary School
description: Delivered 50 hours of competitive programming lessons, technical interview training, and computer science theory to students pursuing a career in the technology industry.
Designed data structure and algorithm practice problems using Java, C++, and Python.
Offered tutorial sessions for students to get assistance on specific problems and topics.

title: Computer Science Tutor @ A.Y. Jackson Secondary School
description: Delivered 40 hours of engaging lessons to students learning Java.
Created flashcards, slideshows, and practice questions tailored to the individual needs of each student.
